name: Rahul Chander
title: Systems Engineer
portfolio_desc: This site has my portfolio of some interesting projects that I am currently working on.  It is high-level at the moment because all projects are at concept phase.  I am getting inspiration from work already done by others in this field and hope to build-upon it and release to the public under open-source license.
biography:
Hello! I am Rahul Chander.

I have a Bachelor's degree in Electrical Engineering from UBC, and a Master's degree in Biomedical Engineering from McGill University. I am pretty much retired now, and I am currently a student at Douglas College where I am learning a few topics that will help me succeed in my aspirations, such as,
  • Machine Learning
  • Web Development
  • Accounting
  • Engineering Prototyping

I am passionate about renewable energy and addressing climate change. Prior to studying at Douglas College, I was busy building my own house using the latest techniques to make it highly energy efficient. During the course of construction, I picked up skills relating to trades and design/architecture. Mostly, I was self-taught and also learned by observing other professionals at their craft.

Through my multi-disciplinary skills, I am planning to create something meaningful that helps us fight the climate-change. I am hoping that through this website, like-minded individuals, can find me and contribute to my projects. Follow my Twitter ® feed and connect with me on Linkedin®.
